___session.description: Information about the client session; how to encrypt it and when it expires.

___secret.description: The secret used to encrypt the session.

___expiresIn.description: Amount of seconds before the session expires.

___token.description: Information about the json web token; how to encrypt it and when it expires.

___secret.description: The secret used to encrypt the token.

___expiresIn.description: Amount of seconds before the token expires.

___userCollection.description: Name of the collection to be used to store user data.

___base.description: The base URI of the web application (e.g. https://localhost:8080).

___logout.description: The path (relative to the base URI) to the logout view.

___login.description: The path (relative to the base URI) to the login view.
